title: ACID ScraperZ - Anime
description: This is a Express provider package for Syncler written by JonathanAkaJD. This package is Anime specific and is intended to be used in conjunction with the ACID ScraperZ - TV&Movie package and ACID ScraperZ - Cached package. This will provide you with the most extensive and diverse link experience possible.

title: ACID ScraperZ - TV&Movie
description: This is a Express provider package for Syncler written by JonathanAkaJD. Use this package in conjunction with the ACID ScraperZ - Cached package to maximize the links available to you.

title: ACID ScraperZ - Cached
description: This is a Kosmos provider package for Syncler written by JonathanAkaJD. Use this package in conjunction with the ACID ScraperZ - TV&Movie package to maximize the links available to you.
